snippet: Army officials said that despite concerns about the credibility of the main accuser, they did not doubt her central claim of forced oral sex.
abstract: Army officials say despite concerns about the credibility of the main accuser against Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair, they do not doubt her central claim of forced oral sex; Sinclair has admitted a three-year consensual affair with his main accuser, captain who worked for him, but he has denied her claims that he forced her to perform oral sex.
lead_paragraph: Army officials said that despite concerns about the credibility of the main accuser, they did not doubt her central claim of forced oral sex.

headline.main: General’s Bid for Dismissal of Sex Case Is Countered
headline.print_headline: General’s Bid for Dismissal of Sex Case Is Countered
